# [Interview #850: Brandon Sanderson's Blog: My Dragon*Con Schedule, Entry #3](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=850#3)

#### Brandon Sanderson

My novella
*Legion*
from Subterranean Press should also make its debut at the convention, at a Saturday signing in the Missing Volume booth in the dealers' room. That depends on whether the books ship from the printer on time. We're crossing our fingers!
